subject: Football
College Athletics
Hurricane Katrina
lead_paragraph: By the time Louisiana State or Ohio State is crowned the national champion at the Superdome, nearly $500 million will have been injected into the New Orleans economy by three bowl games.
snippet: By the time Louisiana State or Ohio State is crowned the national champion at the Superdome, nearly $500 million will have been injected into the New Orleans economy by three bowl games.
